data.script:
<script>
    import {Button, Stack} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Stack.Container
    orientation="horizontal"
    alignment_y="top"
    spacing="medium"
    variation="wrap"
>
    <Button>This is a DEFAULT Button!</Button>

    <Button shape="circle">
        This is a CIRCLE Button!
    </Button>

    <Button shape="pill">
        This is a PILL Button!
    </Button>
</Stack.Container>
data.title: Button Shapes
